entry.def: Aesthetics is a branch of philosophy concerned with the study of the idea of beauty.

means.word_mean: 1. (art) the branch of philosophy dealing with beauty and taste (emphasizing the evaluative criteria that are applied to art);

sentences.sentence: "traditional aesthetics assumed the existence of universal and timeless criteria of artistic value"
